short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harness the incredible power of active recall for language learning, right from your web browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Got a long list of words you want to learn but can never find the time to practice and review? 

Introducing phreview, a Chrome extension that will change the way you practice foreign languages! Create your own language sets and add phrase-translation pairs for each language set. 

phreview utilizes the "active recall" learning style, which helps you efficiently memorize your phrase-translation pairs. By pressing a few keys (CMD + Shift + O for Mac, Alt + Shift + O for PC), you can activate a popup quiz with a phrase-translation pair strategically chosen from custom algorithms that prioritize phrase-translation pairs needing the most revision.

phreview is perfect for anyone who wants to learn a new language or improve their existing language skills. Whether you're a student, a traveler, or a language enthusiast, phreview is designed to help you achieve your language learning goals in an effective, efficient, and fun way!
